title: FS: 1910 PC796 Ed Walsh Sepia Postcard SGC 40 SOLD
author: jb217676

posts.post_title: FS: 1910 PC796 Ed Walsh Sepia Postcard SGC 40 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone and happy New Year!
Available for sale is a sweet 1910 PC796 Sepia Postcard of Big Ed Walsh. Graded SGC 40 with a clean back. The price is SOLD including shipping, tracking, and insurance from Canada. PM or post if interested and thanks for looking!

If any other postcards are of interest let me know, I might make something else available! Cheers!
Jeff
